0: dnf install -y chrony iputils dnsutils && chronyd -n -d

[ups-1]
  driver = usbhid-ups
  port = auto
  # pollinterval = 15
  desc = "APC Back-UPS Pro 1500"
  # vendorid = "051D"
  # productid = "0002"
  product = "Back-UPS RS 1500G FW:865.L9 .D USB FW:L9"
  serial = "4B2107P01305"
  # vendor = "American Power Conversion"
  # bus = "001"
# [ups-2]
#   driver = snmp-ups
#   privProtocol=AES
#   port = 192.168.3.82
#   desc = "APC Smart-UPS 750"
# [ups-3]
#   driver = snmp-ups
#   privProtocol=AES
#   port = 192.168.3.83
#   desc = "APC Smart-UPS 750"

[admin]
  password = secret
  actions = SET
  instcmds = ALL
  upsmon master
[upsmon]
  password = secret
  upsmon slave

MONITOR ups-1@localhost 1 admin secret master
SHUTDOWNCMD "/sbin/shutdown -h +0"
POWERDOWNFLAG /etc/killpower
POLLFREQ 15
POLLFREQALERT 5
HOSTSYNC 15
{"http_headers":{"User-Agent": "Mozilla/5.0 (Windows NT 10.0; Win64; x64; rv:123.0) Gecko/20100101 Firefox/123.0"}}

/hr/quay.io-jetstack-charts-cert-manager.title: cert-manager helm release
/hr/quay.io-jetstack-charts-cert-manager.name: cert-manager
/hr/quay.io-jetstack-charts-cert-manager.doc: cert-manager is a certificate management controller for Kubernetes. It automates the management and issuance of TLS certificates from various issuing sources. It will ensure certificates are valid and up to date periodically, and attempt to renew certificates at an appropriate time before expiry.

0:
MONITOR ups@network-ups-tools-app.monitoring.svc.cluster.local:3493 1 upsmon "bacon" slave
SHUTDOWNCMD "/sbin/shutdown -h +0"
POWERDOWNFLAG /etc/killpower
POLLFREQ 15
POLLFREQALERT 5
HOSTSYNC 15

[upsmon]
  password  = "bacon"
  actions = SET
  instcmds = ALL
  upsmon master

[ups]
  driver = "usbhid-ups"
  port = "auto"
  vendorid = "051D"
  productid = "0002"
  product = "Back-UPS NS 1500M2 FW:957.e4 .D USB FW:e4"
  vendor = "American Power Conversion"
  bus = "001"

MONITOR ups@localhost:3493 1 upsmon "bacon" master
SHUTDOWNCMD "/sbin/shutdown -h +0"
POWERDOWNFLAG /etc/killpower
POLLFREQ 15
POLLFREQALERT 5
HOSTSYNC 15
